short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple bookmark manager for a webpage. Add and jump to any position or bookmark in a page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple bookmark manager for Chrome. Add bookmarks at any position in a page. Navigate to top and bottom of the page with the added buttons. In addition the bookmarks are sychronized among your PCs.
